job_description: Senior Data Analyst - job post Resolute Management Group LLC San Antonio, TX Full-time, Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Full-time Contract Description: The contractor shall provide guidance and functional expertise in strategic planning and partnering to the METC (Medical Education and Training Campus) commandant and staff in the areas of performance metrics, and shall provide consolation, guidance, and functional expertise in developing and identify performance measurements to find trends and cost saving measures for METC. Requirements: Duties include, not limited to: Produce and format a multitude of metrics that shall impact the organizationâ€™s outcomes, goals, objectives and strategic plan. Provide graphical data to demonstrate trends and other statistical data to user-level as well as senior executives. Evaluate and recommend performance measures for METC. Make recommendations that shall provide ongoing improvements to the organization. Implement approved recommendations with the creation of live, real-time dashboards. Analyze metrics, identify areas of concern, provide trend analysis and be proactive in identifying future problems. Establish, design, and maintain performance metrics for all areas of METC. Assist leadership in identifying critical areas for metrics. Collect and input data to produce the most accurate metrics possible. Work with Information Management/Information Technology on processes to streamline data collection. Requirements Knowledge and skills with Structured Query Language (SQL) Experience Utilizing Tableau Creator Master's Degree or equivalent At least 10 years of Experience Ability to pass a background check. If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
